short_description: A short description of the project.

__prompts__.author_name: Full name or organization (used in license and pyproject.toml)
__prompts__.author_email: Email address for project contact (used for PyPI publishing and issue reporting)
__prompts__.development_status: Project development phase <integer 1-7> (used in PEP 301 classifier)
__prompts__.short_description: Project summary (used in PyPI and GitHub)
__prompts__.project_name: Main project title (used in README header)
__prompts__.project_name_underscored: Python import name <lowercase, underscores, no spaces> (used in import statements)
__prompts__.project_name_dashed: Distribution name <lowercase, hyphens, no spaces> (used on PyPI)
__prompts__.github_username: GitHub account name (used in repo URL and package metadata)
__prompts__.python_version: Minimum Python version <X.Y.Z format> (used in dependency specification)
__prompts__.add_script: CLI tool inclusion flag <y/n> (used in build configuration)
